54 //embed the first face
55 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
56 template< class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
57 void CEuclideanEmbed<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::_embed_first_face( CFace * head )
58 {
59  CHalfEdge * he[3];
60 
61  he[0] = this->m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( head );
62  he[1] = this->m_pMesh->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( he[0] );
63  he[2] = this->m_pMesh->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( he[1] );
64 
65  std::vector<CVertex*> av;
66 
67  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
68  {
69  av.push_back( this->m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget( he[(i+2)%3] ) );
70  }
71 
72  CEdge * e = this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( he[0] );
73  av[0]->huv() = CPoint2(0,0);
74  av[1]->huv() = CPoint2( e->length(), 0 );
75 
76  CPoint2 c1,c2;
77 
78  _circle_circle_intersection( CCircle( av[0]->huv(), this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge(he[2])->length()),
79  CCircle( av[1]->huv(), this->m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge(he[1])->length()),
80  c1,c2);
81 
82  if( cross( av[1]->huv() - av[0]->huv(), c1- av[0]->huv() ) > 0 )
83  {
84  av[2]->huv() = c1;
85  }
86  else
87  {
88  av[2]->huv() = c2;
89  }
90 
91 
92  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
93  {
94  this->m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget( he[i] )->touched() = true;
95  }
96 
97 };
98 
99 
100 //vertex A, vertex B are known, vertex C is unknown
101 
102 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
103 template< class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/23
104 void CEuclideanEmbed<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::_embed_face( CFace * head )
105 {
106  std::vector<CVertex*> av;
107 
108  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::FaceVertexIterator fviter( head ); !fviter.end(); fviter ++ )
109  {
110  CVertex * pV = *fviter;
111  av.push_back( pV );
112  }
113 
114  CVertex * A = NULL;
115  CVertex * B = NULL;
116  CVertex * C = NULL;
117 
118  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
119  {
120  if( av[i]->touched() ) continue;
121  C = av[(i+0)%3];
122  A = av[(i+1)%3];
123  B = av[(i+2)%3];
124  break;
125  }
126 
127  if( C == NULL ) return;
128 
129  //radius of the first circle
130  double r1 = this->m_pMesh->vertexEdge(A,C)->length();
131  //radius of the second circle
132  double r2 = this->m_pMesh->vertexEdge(B,C)->length();
133  //center of the first circle
134  CPoint2 c1 = A->huv();
135  //center of the second circle
136  CPoint2 c2 = B->huv();
137 
138 
139  CPoint2 i1;
140  CPoint2 i2;
141 
142  int result =_circle_circle_intersection( CCircle(c1,r1), CCircle(c2,r2), i1, i2);
143 
144 
145  if( result )
146  {
147  if( cross( c2-c1, i1 - c1 ) > 0 )
148  C->huv() = i1;
149  else
150  C->huv() = i2;
151 
152  C->touched() = true;
153  }
154 
155 
156  // This should never happen, once this happends,
157  // we use crude approximation
158 
159  if( ! result )
160  {
161  assert(0);
162  }
163 }
164
